description:
Fitness Appz contains the following applications.

1. 100 Pushups
2. 200 Squats
3. 200 Situps
4. 20 Chinnups 

Pushups:
 •Push Ups are the, one of the best exercise for muscles of the chest, arms and core development. •If you're very serious about increasing your strength, follow this six week training program and you'll be on your way to completing 100 consecutive pushups! •Pushups are important and best Chest Exercise. •With only 30 minutes per week, this app is going to help you get fit and do 100 pushups. •Perform an initial test first & then this number will dictate your targets over the ensuing six week period. •This app also helps you to decide the target by performing an initial test. •If you are following the training program strictly you can perform 100 pushups.  

Situps:
 •Situps are the, one of the best exercise for increasing your core strength, fitness and general health. •If you're very serious about increasing your strength, follow this six week training program and you'll be on your way to completing 200 consecutive situps! •Situps are important and best leg exercise. •With only 30 minutes per week, this app is going to help you get fit and do 100 pushups. •Perform an initial test first & then this number will dictate your targets over the ensuing six week period. •This app also helps you to decide the target by performing an initial test. •	If you are following the training program strictly you can perform 200 situps.

Squats:
•Squats are the, one of the best exercise for increasing your core strength, fitness and general health. •If you're very serious about increasing your strength, follow this six week training program and you'll be on your way to completing 200 consecutive squats!

Chinnups: 
•If you're very serious about increasing your strength, follow this six week training program and you'll be on your way to completing 20 consecutive chinnups!
